context.introduction: Discover Korean side dishes and classic meals. Learn about the variety and balance that defines Korean dining.

sections.title: Side Dish Culture
sections.content: Korean meals feature multiple small dishes that complement the main course and add variety.

sections.title: Traditional Soups
sections.content: Korean soups range from simple broths to hearty stews, each serving different purposes in the meal.

sections.title: Mixed Dishes
sections.content: Some Korean dishes combine multiple ingredients in one bowl, creating balanced, complete meals.

sections.title: Meal Balance
listItems: Korean meals aim for variety and balance
Traditional names often describe the dish's essence
Side dishes are served in specific quantities
